MS MCQs

    Author a basic formula that uses tables and records in a Power Apps canvas app

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is true?

      Collections are table variables in which you can temporarily store data in rows and columns.

      Collections are automatically stored in your data source.

      Use collections with forms.


    2. The LookUp function is used for?

      Returning all the upper records of a data source.

      To update a specific record in your data source.

      To return the first record that matches a given criteria.

      To look for all the records that match a given criteria.


    3. When you use the Table function what happens to the data?

      It creates a table of data that is stored permanently on the local device.

      It creates a table of data in a collection to be used throughout your app.

      Is updates your external data source with new data.

      It creates a table of data to be used by a specific control.
